mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEID, WRITEDT ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writeId}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT POSTSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, LIKES, WRITEID, WRITEDT, CHGID, CHGDT, ISDELETED FROM POST WHERE ISDELETED = 0 ORDER BY POSTSEQ DESC LIMIT #{startlist}, #{listsize}

SELECT POSTSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, LIKES, WRITEID, WRITEDT, CHGID, CHGDT, ISDELETED FROM POST WHERE ${type} LIKE '%${keyword}%' AND ISDELETED = 0 ORDER BY POSTSEQ DESC LIMIT #{startlist}, #{listsize}
SELECT POSTSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, LIKES, WRITEID, WRITEDT, CHGID, CHGDT, ISDELETED FROM POST WHERE POSTSEQ = #{postSeq}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM POST WHERE ISDELETED = 0
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM POST WHERE ${type} LIKE '%${keyword}%' AND ISDELETED = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE POSTSEQ = #{postSeq}
UPDATE POST SET ISDELETED = 1 WHERE POSTSEQ = #{postSeq}
UPDATE POST SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, CHGID =#{chgId}, CHGDT = SYSDATE() WHERE POSTSEQ = #{postSeq}
UPDATE POST SET LIKES = LIKES + 1 WHERE POSTSEQ = #{postSeq}
UPDATE POST SET LIKES = LIKES - 1 WHERE POSTSEQ = #{postSeq}
